create.table: CREATE TABLE $[TABLENAME] ( ID INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, PARENT_UID VARCHAR(50), FORM_UID VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, RECORD_ID VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, FLOW_TEMPLATE_ROOT_ID INTEGER, FLOW_STATE INT, CREATE_USER_ID INT, CREATE_DATE TIMESTAMP(6), WORK_FLOW_ID VARCHAR(50), LAST_BODY_ID VARCHAR(50), WORK_FLOW_NOTE VARCHAR(50), FILE_INFO VARCHAR(50), VER_GROUP_UID VARCHAR(50), VER_SOURCE_UID VARCHAR(50), IS_CURR_VAR CHAR(1), F_VALUE_000 VARCHAR(10), PRIMARY KEY (ID) )
create.tableColletion: CREATE TABLE $[TABLENAME] ( ID INT NOT NULL, PARENTID INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (ID) )
